channel.title: Why wont npc's move?
channel.description:
i added these
[code]spawn = 20 3212 3461 0 3210 3459 3214 3463 1 paladin varrock castle[/code]
and i know how to properly add them but when there on the server they wont move atall just stay in one position...
im using new cheezscape 78 update

item.title: Why wont npc's move?
item.dc:creator: @Legend1 -Legend-
item.description:
@Legend1 wrote:

[quote=“o b b y k o, post:4, topic:7937”][quote author=pat link=topic=11191.msg126025#msg126025 date=1154751651]

spawn = 20	3212	3461	0	3210	3459	3214	3463	1	paladin varrock castle

ok to make them move u have to change the rangex1 range x2 rangey1 and rangey2

rangex1 means how far east u want that npcs to move
rangex2 mean how far north u want it to go
rangey1 means how far south u want it to go
rangey2 means how far west u want it to go

there ya go…if u have anymore probs pm me…

[/quote]

ROFL! You have ur x’s and y’s wrong anyways. I have the same prob tho[/quote]

Nice almost year full bump fuckhead.

Read full topic

item.title: Why wont npc's move?

item.description:
@o_b_b_y_k_o wrote:

ok to make them move u have to change the rangex1 range x2 rangey1 and rangey2

rangex1 means how far east u want that npcs to move
rangex2 mean how far north u want it to go
rangey1 means how far south u want it to go
rangey2 means how far west u want it to go

there ya go…if u have anymore probs pm me…[/quote]

ROFL! You have ur x’s and y’s wrong anyways. I have the same prob tho

item.title: Why wont npc's move?
item.dc:creator: @pat pat
item.description:
@pat wrote:

spawn = 20	3212	3461	0	3210	3459	3214	3463	1	paladin varrock castle

ok to make them move u have to change the rangex1 range x2 rangey1 and rangey2

rangex1 means how far east u want that npcs to move
rangex2 mean how far north u want it to go
rangey1 means how far south u want it to go
rangey2 means how far west u want it to go

there ya go…if u have anymore probs pm me…
